summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; to provide a new, more streamlined administrative design review process to apply to townhouse developments that are not subject to the current design review processes, amending Seattle Municipal Code Sections 23.41.004, 23.76.004, 23.76.006, 23.76.011, 23.76.012, 23.76.026 and 23.76.040; adding a new Section 23.41.018, and making various improvements to formatting.
note: Originally referred to Planning, Land Use, and Neighborhoods Committee on 9/21/09. Retired by [Resolution 31289](http://clerk.ci.seattle.wa.us/~scripts/nph-brs.exe?s1=&s3=31289&s2=&s4=&Sect4=AND&l=20&Sect2=THESON&Sect3=PLURON&Sect5=RESNY&Sect6=HITOFF&d=RESF&p=1&u=/~public/resny.htm&r=0&f=S) on March 28, 2011.
